Hi,

Thanks for sharing this with the rest of the community, since other users might find it useful. I am glad that you achieved your scenario. I checked this and it works with the RadRibbon using View Injection.

On the other hand, I realized that in the CreateRegion method of the QATBRegionAdapter class it is creating a Region instance instead of an AllActiveRegion instance. In general the second one is returned for UI Controls that derives from the ItemsControl class. Have you tried to add more than one view to your region?

Fernando Antivero
